summary: "Vagabond Armor" is a lore friendly, stand alone, light armor set. It has a refined look and feel - that of a noble wanderer. The set's design caters to all play-styles by incorporating elements of plate, leather, and cloth. Prepare to kill in style.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/iAViQ.png[/img]

[center]An armor mod by Hothtrooper44.[/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/XqT8Y.png[/img]
A vagabond is a drifter and an itinerant wanderer who roams wherever they please, following the whim of the moment.

This set combines elements of reinforced leather and animal pelts to produce a refined look. Not too shiny... it needs to look warm to wear in the North... and of course it must live up to the visual standards a Dovahkiin would require.

The armor is equivalent to glass armor in armor value and weight. No overpowered nonsense here. Viable to play at any level.

Craftable under the Studded section at a normal forge. The components are fairly simple, but there is a certain satisfaction that comes with forging your own equipment rather than picking it up from a freebie box.

This is a light armor set that comes in three variants: crimson, grey, and leather. The set is hand crafted to fit all races and both genders.
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/jDNZ5.png[/img][youtube]w9lv6jAe658[/youtube][img]http://i.imgur.com/jDNZ5.png[/img]
Feedback on the armor should be left in the comments section. I will read all the comments made and consider requests for alterations and potential fixes.

** If you like it, endorse it! **[/center]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/SfDx9.png[/img]
I would like to take this small space to thank the users of my mods, and the Nexus community at large. I am honored to be a part of this community, and to contribute to it. Thank you for your patronage of my work, whether it comes through comments, endorsements, or even a kind donation. You are the reason that I spend long hours of work bettering Skyrim. The Nexus community is the reason I continue to create mods. Thank you.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/AqA1f.png[/img]
If you wish to use this armor set for your mod, please ask me by message first.
I do wish to help other mods and the community at large with my work, so don't hold back from asking!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/HdDsL.png[/img]
hothtrooper44 - Vagabond Armor
Bethesda - Skyrim and it's assets
